item.title: Shodan Workshop Resource List
item.description: Welcome! This is a list of resources to supplement my “Basic Hacking in 2019 with Shodan” workshop. First it’s very important to take care of yourself out there when you start poking around. I recommend a VPN to hide who you are a bit and some kind of browser tools to prevent someone from running malicious code in your browser. My favorite VPN is Nord, and I use the uMatrix browser extension in all my browsers to control what code my browsers are running.
